ClassDesc: Defines all device class constants. Each @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothClass_E@ encodes exactly one device class, with major and minor components. The constants in @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothClass#Device_E@ represent a combination of major and minor device components (the complete device class). The constants in @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothClass#Device#Major_E@ represent only major device classes. See @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothClass#Service_E@ for service class constants.
